unnormalised: Basically, it's like having a personal tutor for every student, but powered by AI. Imagine, instead of everyone getting the same "one-size-fits-all" textbook, students get material tailored *exactly* to their learning speed and style. If Priya from IIT-Delhi aces the fractions section, the system automatically moves her onto more advanced topics. If Rohan in a village near Patna is struggling, it provides him with extra practice and maybe even different explanations.
